title: How to Reset and Program Genie Wireless Keypad Remote Pin

steps.title: Hold down PROG+6+Up/Dwn, the red LED light on the keypad will go out.
steps.content: Hold down PROG+6+Up/Dwn, the red LED light on the keypad will go out.

steps.title: Enter New PIN+PROG, the red LED light on the keypad will blink slowly 2-5 times and go out.
steps.content: Enter New PIN+PROG, the red LED light on the keypad will blink slowly 2-5 times and go out.

steps.title: Press Learn Code on the garage door motor, the red LED on the motor will blink.
steps.content: Press Learn Code on the garage door motor, the red LED on the motor will blink.

steps.title: Enter New PIN+Up/Dwn, the red LED on the motor will go solid.
steps.content: Enter New PIN+Up/Dwn, the red LED on the motor will go solid.

steps.title: Press Up/Dwn, the red LED on the motor will go out and the keypad will stay illuminated for about 30 seconds.
steps.content: Press Up/Dwn, the red LED on the motor will go out and the keypad will stay illuminated for about 30 seconds.

steps.title: Once the keypad backlight is off enter new PIN+Up/Down, the door will close/open.
steps.content: Once the keypad backlight is off enter new PIN+Up/Down, the door will close/open.
